name: Castlevania Kyuketsuki no Kirachimu ( Vampire Killerteam )
name_original: Castlevania Kyuketsuki no Kirachimu ( Vampire Killerteam )
description:
This is a free fan-made local 1 or 2 player co-op simultaneous CV game meant to be played with an NES controller.But will work with any controllers. Over 15 bosses , many power ups , levels, appreciation and hard work. 

A README isincluded in the zip file with more details and controls.
